revised_title: Disproportionation to Combination Ratios of Alkyl Radical Interactions
tldr: The authors studied the disproportionation to combination ratios of alkyl radical interactions, particularly focusing on the hydrogenation of olefines. They measured the rates of production of various paraffins and determined the ratios for different alkyl radicals, providing insights into the structures of interacting radicals and the disproportionation reactions.
